title: I got chat restricted 10 games, and I dont think I deserve it
body:
Game 1
In-Game
Arcane Blue Boi: i play ryze jng better than lane
Arcane Blue Boi: but help pls
Arcane Blue Boi: dude what the fuck
Arcane Blue Boi: leash the jungler
Arcane Blue Boi: .
Arcane Blue Boi: you dont leash me but expect me to have pressure
Arcane Blue Boi: what fucking planet are you on?
Arcane Blue Boi: because I dont play what you want me to?
Arcane Blue Boi: oh.
Arcane Blue Boi: well you ''doN'T'' deserve gank then
Arcane Blue Boi: thresh loves the insult ''dog''. you should get used to it
Arcane Blue Boi: +2
Arcane Blue Boi: he just learned that word. dont mind him
Arcane Blue Boi: i dont have pressure, no leash
Arcane Blue Boi: monkas
Arcane Blue Boi: is saying that reportable?
Arcane Blue Boi: you do'Nt deserve gank, dog
Arcane Blue Boi: woof woof
Arcane Blue Boi: cool
Arcane Blue Boi: I cant, no pressure, no leash
Arcane Blue Boi: sorry ori
Arcane Blue Boi: man you 04 youd lose it
Arcane Blue Boi: i'm muting you thresh, nothing personal
Arcane Blue Boi: pff all 1 hp
Arcane Blue Boi: haha you're learning his vocabulary
Arcane Blue Boi: he's still flaming?
Arcane Blue Boi: glad i muted him
Arcane Blue Boi: man's malding over a videogame
Arcane Blue Boi: woof woof
Arcane Blue Boi: we're basically playing with less 2...
Arcane Blue Boi: vi can free delete 1 person
Arcane Blue Boi: wuk same
Arcane Blue Boi: so ff'
Arcane Blue Boi: yeah dw
Arcane Blue Boi: this thresh is the problem
Arcane Blue Boi: flaming more than playing
Arcane Blue Boi: thresh still flaming?
Arcane Blue Boi: thats sad
Arcane Blue Boi: my man's been malding from min 1
Arcane Blue Boi: woof woof
Arcane Blue Boi: pls dont pyke
Arcane Blue Boi: he's probably crying at this point
Arcane Blue Boi: dont massacre him more
Arcane Blue Boi: xd

Post-Game

Arcane Blue Boi: gg corky
Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
Arcane Blue Boi: this guy really hates his life
Arcane Blue Boi: dont report him
Arcane Blue Boi: he's just having a bad time irl probably
Arcane Blue Boi: :/
Arcane Blue Boi: gg!

Game 2

In-Game

Arcane Blue Boi: gl :)
Arcane Blue Boi: syndra f 7:30~
Arcane Blue Boi: gj dude
Arcane Blue Boi: unlucky bot :/
Arcane Blue Boi: dont risk
Arcane Blue Boi: jax's out
Arcane Blue Boi: dont tilt man we're fine
Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
Arcane Blue Boi: syndra really oneshots me with 1 combo huh
Arcane Blue Boi: well enemy adc is worse :D
Arcane Blue Boi: this was
Arcane Blue Boi: tf you want me to do she 1shtos me
Arcane Blue Boi: yi got fed aswell
Arcane Blue Boi: if syndra sruns u u dead
Arcane Blue Boi: dont recall
Arcane Blue Boi: he cant
Arcane Blue Boi: push
Arcane Blue Boi: srsly didnt need 3 people to defend a hextex singed but ok
Arcane Blue Boi: ~i got one shotted.
Arcane Blue Boi: terrible
Arcane Blue Boi: flanking sona lol
Arcane Blue Boi: yeahthey're trolling so hard
Arcane Blue Boi: lets just play slowly
Arcane Blue Boi: sry
Arcane Blue Boi: -_-
Arcane Blue Boi: Q 1 milimiter to the right
Arcane Blue Boi: i'd have killed her
Arcane Blue Boi: but yeah sry..
Arcane Blue Boi: chill we got drake anyways
Arcane Blue Boi: dont fight
Arcane Blue Boi: 3v5
Arcane Blue Boi: i told you
Arcane Blue Boi: dont fight 3v5
Arcane Blue Boi: but k
Arcane Blue Boi: ashe spammed me in
Arcane Blue Boi: we are all playing so bad -_-
Arcane Blue Boi: free game ruined by tilt
Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
Arcane Blue Boi: WINNABLE
Arcane Blue Boi: xd
Arcane Blue Boi: we all made our mistakes
Arcane Blue Boi: lets jus
Arcane Blue Boi: not flame
Arcane Blue Boi: lmao
Arcane Blue Boi: np dude



Any questions about the context ask. For example, ''woof woof'' was just because my team's thresh was calling everyone dogs for different reasons and even some of the enemy team. He spammed woof woof a lot aswell. Its not insult him with it, but quoted him. 

The chat restriction is whatever, ok I accept it, I need to talk less anyways, but losing honor level 4 just doesnt seem right.

EDIT: Apparenty the italic is for when I say ''-_-''

replies.body: Yeah chat isnt for arguing and harassing eachother. Shouldve just reported the thresh, not talk about him the entire time. There are no stipulations that allow you to break the rules. So if someone flames you first, just report them back, not flame back calling em sad and saying theyre "the problem". Idk why game 2 is in there. Thats some pretty neutral, easy going chat.
Just remove "I deserve it" from the title and you're right on the money.
Being consistently passive-aggressive does not contribute anything to the game. I would say this is borderline..

Where exactly? I described why i could follow or do a certain action, not really trying to be condescending, just explaining. Of course if someone is asking me for something rudely i'll not be a sweet honey answering...

I've read this and a lot of it sounds passive agressive...  like the post match... or ''flanking sona''... I was being serious about post match, all ally team left and I was speaking to the enemy team. That thresh flamed like I havent seen someone flame in years, but he probably really had a bad day so I told them to not report him. Guess I suffered because he reported me (because he didnt like my champion pick, thats where  all his, and subsequencially mine,  flame started) and sona was enemy team doing a weird flank and I said that joking to our team

Also, when I say things like terrible, or the -_-s, are usually directed at me because some enemy ran away 1 hp or something, so I dont think its really that offensing insulting myself, if that makes sense
Started when you imitated thresh's dog actions and threatened for no ganks.
I didnt threaten, I answered. Different. Imitating thresh was a fun exchange with enemy Pyke, who was also having a heat chat with thresh

If if were up to me I'd say this wouldn't cross the threshold... it's it's definitely a bit negative and moreover fuels the most toxic party to continue 

However it's clear that engaging with toxic people will drag you down and often make you a Target for a report from the same people. 
I agree ... It's very frustrating to have some idiot start flaming but you need to mute them or just let them talk to themselves knowing you'll report after.
I guess its my fault aswell for not muting, but muting  a teammate doesnt feel right, we're a team after all, I avoid muting as much as I can

You dont think you deserved this ?

And how do you know for what Games you got Reported ? Riot certainly didnt Tell you

I dont think I was particularly offensive on any message no. Did I write a lot? Sure.  But please point out any outrageous thing I said, especially on game 2

I know what games these are becasue I remember what happened each game. Game 1 there was a thresh insulting half our and enemy team and just spamming chat overall (and the whole dog thing, so I remember that) and game 2 I dont remember that well... again I wouldnt call that flaming, I was just pointing out facts and trying to get us to cooperate as much as possible despite the bad, but winnable game everyone was having
2 games worth of negative attitude. I'm surprised it was only 10 games.

> [{quoted}](name=Arcane Blue Boi,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZhQkFckA,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-11-04T20:18:47.890+0000)
>
> Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
> Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
> Arcane Blue Boi: yikes
> 
> 


{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
Saying yikes is restrictable? Really? I thought yikes meant expressing shock, isnt it just slang?
It does not earn you a restriction.
u can't type the word mute, just realize this, if u never typed that 1 word im pretty sure u woulda not been punished
Really? Is there a reason for that? I thought that maybe if he knew he was muted, he's start focusing on the game more...

> [{quoted}](name=Arcane Blue Boi,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZhQkFckA,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-11-04T21:29:54.841+0000)
>
> Really? Is there a reason for that? I thought that maybe if he knew he was muted, he's start focusing on the game more...

how would u feel if someone told you to shut the fuck up? obviously typing muted to someone is basically insulting them. the system does make sense that way

if u really want to type muted just leave a few letters out of that word....

I can see why the system detects that, but I fully disagree. If X is muting Y, isnt it because Y is the one who's in the wrong? Not advocating for Y's ban, just dont understand how its X fault. But I know its not  you who makes the rules...
